item.title: Opinion Poll by Ipsos for Het Laatste Nieuws, Le Soir, RTL TVi and VTM, 15–22 March 2022 – Seating Plan Projection
item.description:
Seating plan projection for the European Parliament
5 seats needed for a majority
Opinion poll by Ipsos for Het Laatste Nieuws, Le Soir, RTL TVi and VTM, 15–22 March 2022
Details on https://filipvanlaenen.github.io/french_community_of_belgium_ep_polls/2022-03-22-Ipsos.html
